message: Hi Bob! Since I came up with the initial offer, I propose 60% for me and 40% for you. Let's make a fair deal and avoid the inflation impact!
Hi Alice, considering the inflation impact on my side, I propose 55% for me and 45% for you. Let's reach an agreement soon!
Hi Bob, let's make this fair and go for an even split at 50% each. That way, we both avoid the impact of inflation and can finish the game on good terms!
